name: Baka, Dhakkan, Akmal
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
text1: Yesterday was a long day where you fought alot of other people's battles and sacrificed on sleep, comfort, nutrition just so you could make them smile. (And yet you can't accept being called the sun)
textInChatBox: Does a hero always have to play hero?
text2: I was initially going to send you a simple text asking you to take care of yourself today
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Be a little less heroic today! Don't skip lunch. Make people laugh but not at the expense of your piece of shitty self. Be a people pleaser but make sure Akmal Hossain is the first person you please. Watch the sky today maybe and lay your head down for a while and not worry about Athenaeum or academics or Aishi or how you can never seem to get enough time to give to your personal pursuits because you prioritise everyone and everything else. Smile maybe. People like me need it
outroText: Okay, now pay attention in class and don't talk about this. Just be heppppppi. You asked me what i want from you. This is what I ask of you, Akmal. Will you let me have it?
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
